quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Steal field notes about the mysterious Chalice
quests.shortDescription: Rumor has it Trace has stumbled across a powerful object he doesn't understand. - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Report to Aura to help find the Chalice of Cubetastrophe
quests.shortDescription: We'll find that chalice. I have a plan... - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Investigate Petroglyph at Rumble Ruins to help locate the Chalice
quests.shortDescription: The cup wanted to be found by a new wielder. It must have left clues to its location... - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Investigate Petroglyph at Rumble Ruins to help locate the Chalice
quests.shortDescription: The cup wanted to be found by a new wielder. It must have left clues to its location... - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Investigate Petroglyph at Rumble Ruins to help locate the Chalice
quests.shortDescription: The cup wanted to be found by a new wielder. It must have left clues to its location... - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Investigate Petroglyph at Rumble Ruins to help locate the Chalice
quests.shortDescription: The cup wanted to be found by a new wielder. It must have left clues to its location... - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.shortDescription: Bring your findings to me. We'll recreate a map to the Chalice of Cubetastrophe. - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Locate the Chalice using Aura's map
quests.shortDescription: Collect the chalice... And watch out for Orelia and Oro. They have something to do with this. - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Make an offering of 100 Gold Bars to reveal the hidden Chalice
quests.shortDescription: Orelia or Oro will reveal themselves for some gold Bars. - Aura

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.description: Collect the Chalice and bring it to Aura
quests.shortDescription: Bring the Chalice back to me. And, er, I guess Orelia and Oro can come too. - Aura

quests.name: [Hidden Quest] Admire Coral Buddy Plushie
quests.shortDescription: Placeholder

quests.name: Placeholder
quests.shortDescription: Placeholder

quests.name: Collect ammo
quests.shortDescription: I could use some help, but I need you to prove you're ready for this. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Deal damage to opponents while in water or a boat
quests.description: Deal damage to opponents while in water or a boat
quests.shortDescription: Anybody can fight on land. I need an experienced aquatic warrior. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Speak with Bryne about the coastal location of Rare Coral
quests.description: Speak with Bryne about the coastal location of Rare Coral
quests.shortDescription: Princess Bryne is worried about the Coral Buddies... but she has an idea for how to find them. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Collect a Coral Sample at the Secret Island Location
quests.description: Collect a Coral Sample at the Secret Island Location
quests.shortDescription: Sounds like this coral will help us track down the Coral Buddies. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Take Coral Sample to Frenzy Fields and analyze with Research Equipment
quests.description: Take Coral Sample to Frenzy Fields and analyze with Research Equipment
quests.shortDescription: We've borrowed some science equipment from those Luminaries. Go analyze that coral! - Triggerfish

quests.name: Collect Area Scans from Research Equipment
quests.description: Collect Area Scans from Research Equipment
quests.shortDescription: Bring me those scans. Who knows what danger the Coral Buddies are in... - Triggerfish

quests.name: Liberate and collect fish from Coolers, Ice Machines, or Chests
quests.description: Liberate and collect fish from Coolers, Ice Machines, or Chests
quests.shortDescription: Tell you what. Save some captured sea citizens and I'll loop you in. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Investigate Berg Barge for signs of Coral Buddies
quests.description: Investigate Berg Barge for signs of Coral Buddies
quests.shortDescription: Berg Barge? Turk and Riptide have been hanging around that spot... - Triggerfish

quests.name: Confront Turk and Riptide about the lone Coral Buddy
quests.description: Confront Turk and Riptide about the lone Coral Buddy
quests.shortDescription: I bet those two good-fer-nothings know where the other Coral Buddies are. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Report findings and gain further instruction from Triggerfish
quests.description: Report findings and gain further instruction from Triggerfish
quests.shortDescription: Come see me. We'll lay out a tactical plan to deal with these coral snatchers. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Gain further instruction from Triggerfish
quests.shortDescription: Come find me, and I'll give you the details of our recon & rescue mission. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Hit headshots or eliminate opponents
quests.shortDescription: Can't go into this fight rusty, anchovy. Get some target practice... with moving targets. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Challenge Turk or Riptide to a Duel and defeat them in battle
quests.description: Challenge Turk or Riptide to a Duel and defeat them in battle
quests.shortDescription: It's time to resolve this. For the Coral Buddies! - Triggerfish

quests.name: Speak with Turk or Riptide
quests.shortDescription: Let's see if they're ready to talk now. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Save Coral Buddies in the cave at Berg Barge
quests.description: Save Coral Buddies in the cave at Berg Barge
quests.shortDescription: Time to bring the Coral Buddies home. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Return to Triggerfish
quests.shortDescription: Come by and see me, so I can thank you properly. - Triggerfish

quests.name: Collect a Rare or better assault rifle
quests.description: If you want to get involved in my work, you'll have to show me what you can do. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Collect a Rare or better assault rifle

quests.name: Damage opponents with Rare or better assault rifles
quests.description: Demonstrate your capabilities. And a warning, I'm not easy to impress. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Damage opponents with Rare or better assault rifles

quests.name: Get headshots on opponents with Rare or better assault rifles
quests.description: This assignment will involve conflict. So show me your conflict resolution skills. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Get headshots on opponents with Rare or better assault rifles

quests.name: Get further orders from Slone
quests.description: I think you're the one for the job. Come find me, and we'll talk details. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Get further orders from Slone

quests.name: Take the Refined Kinetic Ore Schematic from Lonely Labyrinth and escape
quests.description: Refined Kinetic Ore is a game changer. I need to know how it works. - Slone

quests.name: Escape the maze with the Refined Kinetic Ore Schematic
quests.description: Get out of there. That's an order! - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Escape the maze with the Refined Kinetic Ore Schematic

quests.name: Deliver the schematic to Slone's Satellite Terminal at the destroyed Rift Gate
quests.description: Get that schematic to my work station safely, or this was all for nothing. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Deliver the schematic to Slone's Satellite Terminal at the destroyed Rift Gate

quests.name: Get further orders from Slone
quests.description: Come see me, and I'll tell you about my work with The Apparatus. - Slone
quests.shortDescription: Get further orders from Slone

quests.name: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Slap 'N' Gone
quests.description: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Slap 'N' Gone
quests.shortDescription: The collapse of the Slap N' Go has churned up the earth around it, bringing ore fragments close to the surface. - Slone

quests.name: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Shady Stilts
quests.description: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Shady Stilts
quests.shortDescription: That village in the jungle seems rich with fragments of refined Kinetic Ore. Check it out. - Slone

quests.name: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Rumble Ruins
quests.description: Dig Refined Kinetic Ore fragments around Rumble Ruins
quests.shortDescription: It seems as though the jungle is rich in refined Kinetic Ore. Just as I suspected. - Slone

quests.name: Get further orders from Slone
quests.shortDescription: Report in to me. Our work together is almost done. - Slone

quests.name: Place Refined Kinetic Ore in The Apparatus
quests.description: Place Refined Kinetic Ore in The Apparatus
quests.shortDescription: The explorers don't approve of me 'experimenting' with The Apparatus. But it's necessary. - Slone

quests.name: Initiate the power sequence program at Slones location
quests.description: Initiate the power sequence program at Slones location
quests.shortDescription: Let's activate the refined Kinetic Ore. Let's hope this goes better than the Rift Warden's experiment... - Slone

quests.name: Inform Slone the work is complete
quests.description: Inform Slone the work is complete
quests.shortDescription: I'm not usually the grateful type, but I'd like to thank you in person. - Slone
